POLICY_COMMENTS_DNS: This policy is designed to enable secure DNS (DoH) since it becomes unavailable in managed browsers, for which every policy causes the browser to become managed. This overrides the automatic setting of DoH in the main policy.
Below are some options you can look into adding instead of the default:
- Mullvad DNS (https://github.com/mullvad/dns-blocklists, best reputation, weak malware blocking)
- DNSForge (https://dnsforge.de, strongest filtering, can be very slow)
- Cloudflare DNS (https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/setup/, fastest and most popular, no adblocking and some data logging)
